overview:
Sudhanshu Raheja is the founder of Vercingetorix Technologies and specializes in Product Development for startups on the web and the mobile.

He has years of experience in building products, defining web and mobile strategies, building teams and raising startups from the ground up. He founded Vercingetorix Technologies in 2007, with a mission to build some really cool web and mobile apps. Since late 2008, they have been working extensively on iPhone applications.

Among others, he has worked on the official iPhone application for one the most popular rock bands ever - Metallica. He has also been instrumental in getting TalentSherpa.com off the ground.

Previously, he had conceived and developed MbaKarma.com, one of India’s first online testing platforms for MBA preparation. He has also played a significant part in building ‘Generatrix’, a MVC stack for applications which run on the LAMP stack.
